name: Sunrise's Order
storyline:
You are a little too addicted to the brand new farming game that has just been released. So addicted, that you decide to go on an adventure like the hero of your favorite video game. After buying a desert island to build your farm there, you are finally ready to live a new life and face all the pitfalls that will arise to succeed in living off your crops.

As you are the only inhabitant on this desert island, you will have to use a delivery service to better equip yourself. Lucky for you, there is Animazon. THE award-winning and most reliable delivery service. Through Animazon, you can buy everything you'll need to succeed in your quest to become a successful small farmer.
summary: Having your own farm as your favorite game hero is your biggest dream. You decide to become the proud owner of a desert island and you are ready to embark on this new adventure and sell your farm products to your future customers.
